properties.comment: 问卷客户抽取处理特殊身份客户信息，包括法律纠纷户和不接受调查客户
properties.entry: -- 更新法律纠纷客户 insert into sati_extraction_identity (customer_id) (select s.customerId from dim_cust_specialidentity s where s.identity = 8 and now() BETWEEN s.beginDate and s.endDate)
-- 查询接受调查客户（biz库） SELECT t.customer_id FROM biz_anomalous_customer t WHERE DATE_ADD(t.start_time, INTERVAL ? MONTH) > now() AND t.anomalous_type = 1
